item.title: Need help whit 508
item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

Guys i using http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,345782.0.html /Berkey scape source and i wona add this command…

} else if(cmd[0].equals("sellwhip")) { if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 4151, 1) == true) Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,4151, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 4151), 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 1000000 ); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "U sell ur whip and gain 1mil coins ");

this command sell a whip of ur inventory and add 1mil coins (like shop)

But only one problem… players can use this command if they hasn’t a whip in they invent and they gain 1 mil coins… but if they hawe a whip it remowes it like it need.! Meybee someone can help me make this command used only if whip is in invent … plz help me guys!!!

Read full topic
